mapper.select: select f.*, k.id k_id, k.first_quadrant_id k_first_quadrant_id, k.content k_content, k.probability k_probability, k.version k_version, k.is_deleted k_is_deleted, k.create_time k_create_time, k.update_time k_update_time from first_quadrant f left join key_result k on f.id = k.first_quadrant_id where f.core_id = #{coreId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by k.probability desc, k.create_time
